items.value:
There is currently not much to do with me!
But you can help the Gang, they always need:

1x Cocaine Baggie
5x Ganja Baggie
5x Ecstasy Baggie

If you got the Stuff you will get:
1x Gang Delivery
i have the Stuff with me!
i will be back in a bit!

You are so fast every time!

Please bring this Gang Delivery to Capone.
He is waiting for it and will pay you well!

Take care and come back when you have Baggies again!

Sorry but you misunderstood me!
Only if you have..

1x Cocaine Baggie
5x Ganja Baggie
5x Ecstasy Baggie

in your Inventory, I can give you the Gang Delivery!
